metadata.description: A spree killer terrorizes New Orleans days before Hurricane Katrina makes landfall. Detective Curt Delatte just buried his only daughter, he's in no condition to work. But when the bodies pile up, he masks his grief and joins the hunt through the bowels of the Big Easy. It won't be long until his city, and his evidence, gets washed away. Chamberlain, a native of South Louisiana, makes his writing debut with this dark and gritty miniseries. MATURE READERS
metadata.name: Sweets
